frameDefinitions: An Agent or Cause limits a Range_of_options to having a certain Characteristic.
An Entity possesses a Value for a certain Attribute which is extreme when compared to the values either of other entities or to values of the same Entity at other points of time.
In this frame an Agent or Cause changes the consistency of a Patient from its Initial_state to a Result.
An Agent changes a Part of a complex entity with regard to some Feature in order to achieve some Imposed_purpose affected by the Feature.

A Cognizer produces a Target_symbol which represents, in the Target_representation format, a Content that pre-exists in the form of a Source_symbol in a Source_representation format. ''  'This word is sometimes  translated as ` girl '.
frameExamples: His choices in life have <t>limited</t> his opportunities severely.
Donna <t>thinned</t> the soup with chicken broth.
I need to <t>adjust</t> the thermostat to around 80 degrees when she visits.
This word is sometimes <t>translated</t> as ` girl '. CNI
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Agent</fen> consciously places limits upon the Range_of_options.
The <fen>Cause</fen> is a natural occurrence or state-of-affairs that limits the Range_of_options.

The <fen>Range_of_options</fen> would normally be expected to have a set of possibilites, but is limited by an <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> to particular subtypes, situations or characteristics.
The <fen>Characteristic</fen> indicates the subtypes or situations to which the <fen>Range_of_options</fen> is limited.
The time at which the limiting takes place.
The location in which the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> limits the <fen>Range_of_options</fen>.
The <fen>Entity</fen> whose <fen>Value</fen> of a particular gradable <fen>Attribute</fen> is extreme.
The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.
A quantity or other characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s state with respect to the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
<fen>Patient</fen> is the entity that undergoes a change.
The <fen>Agent</fen> causes the change of consistency in the <fen>Patient</fen>.
The <fen>Cause</fen> is the non-<fen>Agent</fen> which brings about the change in the <fen>Patient</fen>.
When the <fen>Patient</fen> changes consistency.
Where the the <fen>Patient</fen> changes consistency.
The individual that controls the value of a <fen>Feature</fen>.
The part of the complex entity which is changed in the process of adjusting.
The <fen>Feature</fen> with respect to which the <fen>Part</fen> is adjusted.
The time at which the adjusting occurs.
The location where the adjusting takes place.
This is the person who carries out the translation.
A symbol or set of symbols representing the <fen>Content</fen> in the <fen>Source_representation</fen> format.
The representation system in which the <fen>Content</fen> pre-exists.
A symbol or set of symbols representing the <fen>Content</fen> in the <fen>Target_representation</fen> format.
The representation system into which the <fen>Content</fen> is rendered by the <fen>Cognizer</fen>.
The information that is meant to be represented by the <fen>Source_symbol</fen> and <fen>Target_symbol</fen>.
This Frame Element marks expressions that indicate when a certain Categorization was made.
The location where the translation takes place.
listRoleExamples: <fex>The military</fex> limited building access to key personnel.
<fex>Ongoing rains</fex> have limited drivers to a small number of roads.
The military limited <fex>building access</fex> to key personnel.
The military limited access <fex>to key personnel only</fex>.
Banks are <fex>currently</fex> limiting customers to two cash transactions per day.
<fex>JetBlue's</fex> high of $55.15 was reached on May 6
East Harlem reached its historic <fex>population</fex> high of 210000 in 1950.
The state of Michigan reported a new unemployment high <fex>of 7%</fex>.
She adjusted <fex>the injectors</fex> to make the mixture leaner.
She adjusted <fex>the temperature of the oven</fex> so that the pie crust would brown a little.

The text was published in Lescarbot's Les Muses de la Nouvelle-France (Paris
1609) and later translated <fex>by HT Richardson</fex>.
Biblical scholars typically translate <fex>kenosis</fex> as self-emptying or self-offering.
More books were translated <fex>from other languages</fex> into Russian in the 1980s , including record numbers from English , German and French.
Together with the French Prime Minister, Guizot, he translated it into French <fex>as entente cordiale</fex> for King Louis Philippe to use in his speech.
Well they translated it <fex>into Spanish</fex> as 'Uno-Dos-Tres Meneha Meneha!'
She guided me through the dishes available that afternoon and translated <fex>my order</fex> into Spanish for the older woman in the kitchen.
<fex>Last year</fex> I translated a short book on the artist Anne Ratkowski (of the pre-war November Group in Berlin) from German into English.
